TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementEntityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementEntityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementEntityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: ManagementEntity 屬性指出類別會提供透過 WMI 提供者公開的管理資訊。

span.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不接受名稱參數。This constructor does not take a name parameter. 如果您使用未指定名稱參數相關聯的 WMI 類別的名稱會預設為屬性化類別的名稱。If you do not specify a name by using the parameter, the name of the associated WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool External { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定這個類別是否代表在目前組件外部實作之提供者中的 WMI 類別。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

value.span: 布林值，如果類別代表外部 WMI 類別則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents an external WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當實作提供者實作擴充現有的抽象 WMI 類別的類別，會使用這項目。This is used when implementing providers that implement classes that extend existing abstract WMI classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 類別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

value.span: 包含 WMI 類別名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the WMI class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定此屬性指定 WMI 類別的名稱，WMI 類別會預設為屬性化類別的名稱。If you do not specify the name of the WMI class by setting this property, the WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class. ## Examples 在下列範例中，名稱參數用來設定 MortgageCalcWMIProvider 類別所代表的 WMI 類別的名稱。In the following example, the Name parameter is used to set the name of the WMI class represented by the MortgageCalcWMIProvider class. 它 MortgageCalculator 設定的名稱。It sets the name to MortgageCalculator. 如果使用的參數不是的名稱，對應 C# 類別名稱，MortgageCalcWMIProvider 在此情況下，會使用做為 WMI 類別名稱。If the Name parameter is not used, the corresponding C# class name, MortgageCalcWMIProvider in this case, is used as the WMI class name. ``` [ManagementEntity(Name = "MortgageCalculator")] public class MortgageCalcWMIProvider { } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Singleton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定關聯的類別是否代表單一 WMI 類別。

span.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

value.span: 布林值，如果類別代表單一 WMI 類別則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents a singleton WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一 WMI 類別是其中一個為其可以永遠只會有單一執行個體。A singleton WMI class is one for which there can only ever be a single instance. 雖然您可以撰寫程式碼以確保 WMI 類別的單一執行個體曾在建立邏輯，才能讓您輕鬆且一致的工作提供這個參數的屬性。Although you could code the logic to ensure that only a single instance of a WMI class is ever created, this parameter attribute is provided to make the task easy and consistent. 當使用單一 WMI 類別，用戶端應用程式必須使用特殊的語法。When working with singleton WMI classes, client applications must use special syntax. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Describing 在 MSDN 線上程式庫中的執行個體的物件路徑主題[ http://www.msdn.com ](http://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the Describing an Instance Object Path topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼片段示範如何使用單一參數來表示 C# 類別對應至單一 WMI 類別。The following code snippet demonstrates how to use the Singleton parameter to indicate that a C# class corresponds to a singleton WMI class. ``` [ManagementEntity(Singleton=true)] public class SingletonSample ``` 如需完整的工作的範例實作單一類別的提供者，請參閱[How to： 建立基本的分離提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300)。For a complete, working example of a provider that implements a singleton class, see [How to: Create a Basic Decoupled Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300).
